input.sentences: a wealthy family held their own private party on haloween .
a local rock band was hired to perform
a trained monkey was brought in to ride the dog .
a masked anthropologist brought a recent discovery from the organization .
food was served | but few people ate .
output.sentences: My wealthy neighbors are throwing a private party.
I heard a local rock band will perform in their backyard.
They will show a new indie movie about a trained monkey and his owner.
Once of their recent parties really masked a secret meeting for an evil organization.
Oh, and they served all the people in attendance some good food.
